Name: Uriage Hyseac Foaming Gel: Deep Cleanse for Oily & Acne-Prone Skin | 500ml
Description:
Deeply cleanse your oily and acne-prone skin with **Uriage Hyseac Foaming Gel**. This ultra-gentle, soap-free foaming cleanser is specially formulated to effectively remove impurities and excess sebum, leaving your skin clean and refreshed. Enjoy healthier, brighter skin with every use.

🔹 Usage Instructions for **Uriage Hyseac Foaming Gel**:
⭐ Use on the entire face, morning and evening.
⭐ Gently massage onto wet skin to create a rich lather.
⭐ Rinse thoroughly with water.

🔹 Ingredients of **Uriage Hyseac Foaming Gel**:
⭐ Contains Piroctone Olamine as an anti-bacterial and anti-fungal agent against excess sebum.
⭐ Soap-free formula that is gentle on the skin.
⭐ Effective cleanser that removes impurities and excess sebum.

#Uriage #Hyseac #FaceWash #OilySkin #Acne #SkinCare #Cleanser #BeautyProducts #SaudiArabia #HealthySkin
Short description: Effectively cleanse oily & acne-prone skin with Uriage Hyseac Foaming Gel. Gentle formula removes impurities & excess sebum.

Name: Uriage Dépiderm Intensive Care Anti-Dark Spot Serum with 3% AHA & Vitamin C 30ML
Description:
Introducing the **Uriage Dépiderm Intensive Care Anti-Dark Spot Serum**, a highly effective and well-tolerated formula designed to combat dark spots and dullness. This intensive serum features a unique composition to treat dark spots and uneven skin tone. At its core is the Mela Technology, a blend of pea extract, sucrose, enoxolone, and Uriage Thermal Water, complemented by Vitamin C and Niacinamide. Together, these ingredients work synergistically to fight dark spots. The inclusion of AHA provides exfoliating properties, further enhancing the product's efficacy. This intensive treatment not only corrects the appearance of dark spots but also refines skin texture, leading to a more even and radiant complexion. With a fragrance-free and non-comedogenic formula, it's suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin.

⭐ Evens out skin tone and reduces the appearance of dark spots.
⭐ Brightens the complexion and improves skin texture.
⭐ Free from parabens, alcohol, and fragrances.
⭐ Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin.
⭐ Non-comedogenic.

🔹 Usage Instructions for **Uriage Dépiderm Intensive Care Anti-Dark Spot Serum**:
⭐ Apply the serum to the face, neck, and décolleté.
⭐ Use in the morning and/or evening.
⭐ For best results, use UV protection after application.

🔹 Ingredients of **Uriage Dépiderm Intensive Care Anti-Dark Spot Serum**:
⭐ Mela Technology (Pea Extract, Sucrose, Enoxolone, Uriage Thermal Water) to reduce hyperpigmentation.
⭐ Alpha Hydroxy Acids (AHA) to exfoliate the skin and boost radiance.
⭐ Vitamin C to lighten skin and even out tone.
⭐ Niacinamide to reduce melanin transfer and unify skin tone.

#Uriage #Depiderm #Serum #Skincare #SkinBrightening #DarkSpots #VitaminC #AHAcid #HealthySkin #SaudiArabia
Short description: Uriage Dépiderm Intensive Care Serum fights dark spots and evens skin tone with Vitamin C and AHAs.
foreignCategories: Skin Care, Skin Brightening, Hyperpigmentation & Dark Spots
Categories: Skin Care, Skin Care > Skin whitening products

Name: Uriage Bariésun Cream Fragrance-Free SPF50+ 50ml (1+1 Pack)
Description:
Experience superior sun protection with **Uriage Bariésun Cream Fragrance-Free**. This high-performance sunscreen offers very high protection against UVA and UVB rays, free radicals, and prevents skin dryness, thanks to its advanced formula and Uriage Thermal Water.

**Product Features:**
⭐ Light, non-greasy texture for ultimate comfort.
⭐ Water-resistant for continuous and reliable coverage.
⭐ Absorbs quickly, leaving skin smooth.
⭐ Hypoallergenic and non-comedogenic.
⭐ Fragrance-free for a gentle application experience.
⭐ Prevents photoaging by reinforcing the skin barrier and protecting DNA from UV damage.
⭐ Provides broad-spectrum coverage and photostability against UVB and UVA rays.
⭐ Intensely moisturizes the skin with Aquaspongines and soothing Thermal Water.

**Results:**
⭐ 100% pleasant skin texture!

🔹 Usage Instructions for **Uriage Bariésun Cream Fragrance-Free**:
⭐ Before sun exposure, apply a generous and even layer to cover the exposed area.
⭐ Reapply regularly, especially after perspiring, swimming, or toweling dry.
⭐ Reduce sun exposure as much as possible, even with protection.
⭐ Avoid direct sun exposure for babies and young children.

🔹 Ingredients of **Uriage Bariésun Cream Fragrance-Free**:
⭐ Uriage Thermal Water: Naturally rich in soothing and invigorating minerals that strengthen the skin barrier and reduce inflammation.
⭐ Aquaspongines: Provides intense hydration and protects against dehydration.
⭐ Latest-generation filters: Offer very high protection against UVB and UVA rays.

#Uriage #Sunscreen #Skincare #SunProtection #Bariésun #Moisturizer #Beauty #HealthySkin #FragranceFree #SkinHealth
Short description: Very high UVA/UVB sun protection. Lightweight, non-greasy, water-resistant, and moisturizing. Ideal for daily use.

Name: Uriage Hyaluronic Acid Booster Serum 1.5% - For Plump, 24-Hour Hydrated Skin
Description:
Discover the secret to plump, radiant skin with the **Uriage Hyaluronic Acid Booster Serum 1.5%**. This advanced booster serum is your ultimate solution for deep hydration and a lasting natural glow. Formulated with a potent 1.5% concentration of pure and natural Hyaluronic Acid, it creates a protective film on the skin's surface, smoothing fine dehydration lines and leaving your complexion luminous and peachy-soft.

Experience visible results with **Uriage Hyaluronic Acid Booster Serum 1.5%**: it hydrates, plumps, and smoothens your skin for an impressive 86%* skin plumping effect. Its fresh, light texture is easily absorbed and simple to apply with the convenient dropper. Enriched with Marshmallow Flower for added hydration and antioxidant benefits, plus a patented complex that stimulates your skin's natural defenses. Enjoy a delightful sensory fragrance of Bergamot and Peach with a hint of Cedarwood. Suitable for all skin types, even sensitive, this serum is non-sticky and non-greasy. **Uriage Hyaluronic Acid Booster Serum 1.5%** is your perfect daily skincare companion.

🔹 Usage Instructions for **Uriage Hyaluronic Acid Booster Serum 1.5%**:
⭐ Apply a few drops of the serum to cleansed skin.
⭐ Gently massage until fully absorbed.
⭐ Use daily, morning and evening, before your moisturizer.

🔹 Ingredients of **Uriage Hyaluronic Acid Booster Serum 1.5%**:
⭐ 1.5% Pure & Natural Hyaluronic Acid.
⭐ Marshmallow Flower.
⭐ Patented Complex.
⭐ 97% ingredients of natural origin.
⭐ Paraben-free.
⭐ Non-comedogenic.

#Uriage #HyaluronicAcid #SkinHydration #Skincare #HealthySkin #RadiantSkin #DehydrationTreatment #AntiAging #SkincareProducts #SaudiArabia
Short description: Uriage Hyaluronic Acid Booster Serum 1.5% hydrates, plumps, and smoothes skin. For a plump and radiant complexion.

Name: Uriage Bariésun Kids Sunscreen Spray SPF50+ with Organic Filters & Vitamin E - Fragrance-Free 200ML
Description:
Provide ultimate protection for your child's delicate skin with **Uriage Bariésun Kids Sunscreen Spray**. This very high protection spray against UVB-UVA-Blue Light is water-resistant, keeping sensitive children's skin safe.

Uriage Thermal Water, at the core of Bariésun formulas, helps fight the harmful effects of the sun, reinforcing your child's skin barrier and protecting DNA from UV damage.

⭐ Very high protection against UVB-UVA-Blue Light
⭐ Water-resistant for sensitive children's skin
⭐ Reinforces skin barrier and protects DNA from damage
⭐ Non-sticky and easily absorbed
⭐ Does not sting your eyes
⭐ Tested under dermatological control
⭐ Made in France for quality assurance

🔹 Usage Instructions for **Uriage Bariésun Kids Sunscreen Spray**:
⭐ Apply a sufficient dose of product before exposure (e.g., 8 calf sprays per area).
⭐ Reapply frequently, especially after sweating, swimming, or wiping.
⭐ Even when well protected, minimize direct sun exposure.
⭐ Do not expose babies and young children directly to the sun.
⭐ Shake well before use for even distribution.

🔹 Ingredients of **Uriage Bariésun Kids Sunscreen Spray**:
⭐ Uriage Thermal Water for soothing and hydration.
⭐ Advanced UVB-UVA filtering complex with Tinosorb M.
⭐ Antioxidant Vitamins C and E for extra protection.
⭐ Aquaspongines for deep and lasting hydration.
⭐ Hypoallergenic formula to minimize the risk of allergic reactions.

#Uriage #Sunscreen #Skincare #SunProtection #KidsSkincare #FrenchProducts #Summer #HealthySkin #ChildrensSkincare #SunSafety
Short description: Uriage Kids Sunscreen Spray: Very high SPF protection, water-resistant & eye-safe. Protects delicate skin.

Name: Uriage Bariésun Dry Mist SPF50+ with Vitamin E - 200ml
Description:
Experience superior protection with **Uriage Bariésun Dry Mist SPF50+**.

**Uriage Bariésun Dry Mist SPF50+** is a very high protection sunscreen (SPF 50+) specially formulated to shield your skin.

Product Features:
⭐ Very high protection against UVA/UVB rays and free radicals.
⭐ Enriched with Uriage Thermal Water and Aquaspongines to prevent skin dryness.
⭐ Contains Vitamins C and E for added protection against photo-aging.

⭐ Provides a refreshing effect, ideal for outdoor activities.

🔹 Usage Instructions for **Uriage Bariésun Dry Mist SPF50+**:
⭐ Shake well before use.
⭐ Before sun exposure, spray generously on exposed skin.
⭐ Reapply frequently, especially after sweating, swimming, or towel-drying, to maintain protection.
⭐ Do not spray directly onto the face; spray into your palm first, then apply to the face.
⭐ Minimize sun exposure even with sunscreen. Do not expose babies and young children to direct sunlight.

🔹 Ingredients of **Uriage Bariésun Dry Mist SPF50+**:
⭐ Uriage Thermal Water.
⭐ Aquaspongines.
⭐ Vitamin C & E.
⭐ Latest-generation filters for UVA/UVB protection.

Description:
Experience superior protection with **Uriage Bariesun Dry Oil Spray SPF50+**. Thanks to a high-performance filtering complex, this dry oil provides high protection against UVA and UVB rays and free radicals, preventing skin from drying out. It leaves your skin satin-smooth and illuminates your tan with its vanishing, melt-in, and non-greasy texture. It can also be used on hair, protecting it against dryness and preserving its natural beauty.

🔹 Usage Instructions for **Uriage Bariesun Dry Oil Spray SPF50+**:
⭐ Spray a generous and even layer onto the body and hair before any sun exposure.
⭐ Reapply regularly, especially after perspiring, swimming, or toweling dry.
⭐ Even though you are well protected, reduce exposure as much as possible.
⭐ Do not expose babies and young children directly to the sun.

⭐ High-performance filtering complex for broad-spectrum protection.
⭐ Moisturizing ingredients to prevent skin dryness.
